title: Draco's Wrath
description: DRACO They decided to attack my club, my brothers, and my woman. They have brought pain to many of us throughout these years, hiding in the darkness while they conspired to eliminate my kind. Well, itâ€™s time to show them who we really are. Katrina is my very existence, they hurt her, and now I will hurt them back. They have no idea the wrath that they have unleashed.  KATRINA I always felt that I had a purpose in life, and only when I met Draco did that purpose reveal itself. Draco hasn't only touched my heart, my very soul but he has brought me clarity and a reason to fight for what I believe. I now have a family, and I will do anything to help keep them safe.
author: Alexi Ferreira
